title: Secret Admiration - Revealed
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Dia. How was Ruby after that? Was my advice helpful?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes, you have my gratitude for that. Ruby said that you were very thorough in teaching her. Ruby has also progressed a lot more with her training<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>That’s good to hear.... But it wasn’t much of a concern, was it. She can do anything if she does her best, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, it seems you know plenty about Ruby<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I also know plenty about you, Dia. ....I heard from Ruby that you were a fan of mine....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Eeeeeh!? W-, what....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Ah.... I guess she was wrong. What a shame....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>She wasn’t wrong! She wasn’t wrong at all!! I’m a big fan of yours!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, thank you. I’m happy to hear that. But I’m a big fan of you too, you know, Dia. I really respect your elegant yet dynamic performance<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Uu.... Th-.... Thank you very much....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
